div.p: This value set defines a set of codes that are used to indicate the profile type of a test system when acting as the origin within a TestScript.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/testscript-profile-origin-types defines the following codes:

tr.td: General FHIR client used to initiate operations against a FHIR server.
A FHIR client acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Filler.

description.value: This value set defines a set of codes that are used to indicate the profile type of a test system when acting as the origin within a TestScript.

definition.value: General FHIR client used to initiate operations against a FHIR server.
A FHIR client acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Filler.
